contest-event.event-date:
July 16, 1927 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 3)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 3) 30 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-3
None
Poetic Fancies
White House Ground, Abingdon Road, Oxford, Oxfordshire, UK Open to "Class B" Oxford association bands which had not won a cash prize exceeding £5 since 1921.
1st prize: Major Edmondson Challenge Cup, £5 2nd prize: £3 3rd prize: £2 Medals for best solo cornet, horn, baritone, trombone, euphonium. Silver medal with gold centre for bandmaster and secretary of winning band.
March 23, 2017, 10:51 a.m. March 29, 2017, 11 a.m.
1 Brackley Borough A. Smith
2 High Wycombe Borough H. J. Rolfe
3 Fairford Silver L. Adams
Unknown Result Bletchington Silver Band S. Alderman
Unknown Result Flackwell Heath W. J. Burnham
Unknown Result Abingdon Town Band R. Daniels
Withdrawn Brackley Town E. H. Blackwell
